sentences.sContent: And not one involves lavender candles.
sentences.sCn: 这可不需要点薰衣草蜡烛。

sentences.sContent: The plantation is one of the largest lavender farms in the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: The plantation is one of the largest lavender farms in the world.
sentences.sCn: 这里的农场是世界上最大的薰衣草农场之一。

trans.tranOther: a plant that has grey-green leaves and purple flowers with a strong pleasant smell
